name: Joe Dunlap
coverLetter: My name is Joe Dunlap and I've been growing/cultivating marijuana for about 4 years now and I'm trying to place my foot in the medical field and replace my day to day Job, I have knowledge/experience on growing from seed as well as from clone, dry/wet trimming, and curing. I'm just looking for a place to pitch up a tent or park a trailer and hopefully be supplied with a meal a day or at least water. I can work 6 days a week, not Sunday (religious purposes)
